briefdescription.para: Master gain by sound source type.
Destruct. Terminate the audio thread and free the audio buffer.

memberdef.argsstring: (int bufferLengthMSec, int mixRate, bool stereo, bool interpolation=true)
memberdef.name: SetMode

briefdescription.para: Initialize sound output with specified buffer length and output mode.
Run update on sound sources. Not required for continued playback, but frees unused sound sources & sounds and updates 3D positions.

detaileddescription.para: Set master gain on a specific sound type such as sound effects, music or voice. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Pause playback of specific sound type. This allows to suspend e.g. sound effects or voice when the game is paused. By default all sound types are unpaused.
Resume playback of specific sound type.
Resume playback of all sound types.

detaileddescription.para: Set active sound listener for 3D sounds. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Stop any sound source playing a certain sound clip.

detaileddescription.para: Return byte size of one sample. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether output is interpolated. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether output is stereo. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether audio is being output. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether an audio stream has been reserved. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return master gain for a specific sound source type. Unknown sound types will return full gain (1). BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Return whether specific sound type has been paused.
Return whether the specified master gain has been defined.
Add a sound source to keep track of. Called by SoundSource.
Remove a sound source. Called by SoundSource.
Return sound type specific gain multiplied by master gain.
Mix sound sources into the buffer.
Stop sound output and release the sound buffer.
Actually update sound sources with the specific timestep. Called internally.
